Title: Leaving
Writer: Catherine Corsini (scenario), Gaëlle Macé (collaborator), Antoine Jaccoud (scenario consultant), Emmanuelle Bernheim (scenario consultant)
Actors: Kristin Scott Thomas, Sergi López, Yvan Attal, Bernard Blancan
Plot: Suzanne is a well married mother, but her bourgeois lifestyle gets her down and she decides to go back to work as a physiotherapist by building an office in their backyard. Then Suzanne falls in love with the man hired to build the office.
